title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 406 - Recording and Reporting Requirements for Social Services Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 406 - Recording and Reporting Requirements for Social Services Programs

State Regulations
§ 406.1 - Maintenance of records
§ 406.2 - Social services recording
§ 406.3 - Social services reporting
§ 406.4 - Child care review service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 1, pt. 406

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20, 34, 390[2][d], 410[1], 410-x

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
